name: Space Shooter 2.0
description:
Hi, 

Controls:

Singleplayer: move with WASD shoot with f and special with g.

Coop: player 1 same as Singleplayer, player 2: move with arrows shoot with num1 and num2.

This game is NOT finished. I want to add more enemys, a shop to upgrade your ship, big boss-enemys with weak spots to shoot at and better grafics. I will publish the single-player mode on Android and if the developement goes well I will go for the steam-store.
